page.description: Returns TRUE if we are on the last record of the specified (or current) search order.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.EOF() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.EOF( [ Tagname as C ] ) ArgumentDescription TagnameOptional. Default = Record number order. The name of an index.
Description The &ltTBL>.EOF() method returns Result_Flag with a value of .T. (TRUE) if the current record is the last record in the logical order specified by Tagname. Note : Use the <TBL>.FETCH_EOF() method to test for end of file when reading records. Example This calculated field on a form returns True if the current record is the last record in lastname order. table.current().eof("lastname")
See Also Table Functions and Methods
